column4: is there an eta for 12.04LTS?  i just want to know if its days, weeks, or months.
Just so you know, the naming convention is YY.MM, so it can't be months, since it's already month 4.
oh.  i didn't expect they had any relation to the outside world.  thought they were just version numbers.  good to know.
The release is every 6 months, which is why it always ends in .04 or .10
